metadata.name: Summer Morning Trip - Extended Scene
metadata.description:
On a tranquil summer morning, I embarked on a picturesque trip to the countryside, seeking solace amidst nature's embrace. The golden rays of the rising sun painted the landscape with a warm, inviting glow. As I drove down the meandering country roads, the rolling hills greeted me with their vibrant green hues, adorned by colorful wildflowers that danced in the gentle breeze. 

The sweet aroma of freshly cut grass and blooming blossoms filled the air, invigorating my senses. The melodious chirping of birds provided a harmonious soundtrack as I immersed myself in the serenity of the countryside. With every passing moment, I felt a deep connection to the earth, finding peace in the simplicity and beauty that surrounded me.
